about_the_game:
Late at night, while her parents are away, a disturbing presence creeps in and a red-tinted otherworldly world appears.
Emma, a college student, explores the otherworldly house alone.
A late-night escape from the other world, where despair and hope intersect, begins.


Players will explore from Emma's point of view in an immersive first-person perspective.
In the Otherworld, spirits of the dead lurk everywhere and various horrors attack.
Players will search for switches hidden in the house and escape from the other world while running from the roaming spirits of the dead.


Luna's eye has a mysterious ability to see into the other world.
The player attempts to escape from the other world using Luna's cues and notes as clues.
Will Emma be able to escape from the other world and celebrate her 20th birthday safely?

*There are two endings, normal and true.

*About the distribution of live games
You are welcome to distribute live games. No advance notice is required.
We would appreciate it if you could include the URL of the store page in the summary section.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has content not intended for all ages and contains violence and gore.

Late at night, while her parents are away, a disturbing presence creeps in and a red-tinted otherworldly world appears.
Emma, a college student, explores the otherworldly house alone.
A late-night escape from the other world, where despair and hope intersect, begins.

Luna's eye has a mysterious ability to see into the other world.
The player attempts to escape from the other world using Luna's cues and notes as clues.

name: LUNA'S EYES

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: ８ GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX1660
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit

short_description: A first-person horror adventure set in a red-tinted otherworld. Escape from the otherworldly house by using Luna the cat's cues and clues
